sourceMeaningMnemonic: When the <radical>tsunami</radical> struck, it hit your <radical>tent</radical> full of <radical>beans</radical>. When you lost your tent of beans, you had a moment of <kanji>lucidity</kanji>. You don't need so much stuff, you can live without it!
meaningInfo: Then you went back to being crazy. That moment of lucidity was only temporary, and you go back to stockpiling beans.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>lucidity</kanji> is clear to everyone because you wear a <reading>sui</reading>t (<ja>す</ja>). Everyone knows that lucid people wear suits!
readingInfo: Imagine yourself wearing a sharp suit and being a model of lucidity
